const char GetReadyPallet[] PROGMEM = {//16 entries each level
0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000111,0b00000110,0b00000110,0b00000101,0b00000011,0b00000010,0b00000001,0b00000010,
0b00000010,0b00000011,0b00000101,0b00000110,0b00000111,0b00000111,

0b10001010,0b10001010,0b10010011,0b10010011,0b11011100,0b11011100,0b11100101,0b11100101,0b11101110,0b11101110,
0b11100101,0b11100101,0b11011100,0b11011100,0b10010011,0b10010011,
};

const uint8_t CrashPallet[] PROGMEM = {
0x01,0x03,0x04,0,
0x03,0x05,0x07,0,

0x8A,0x93,0xDC,0,
0xDC,0xE5,0xEE,0,
};

const uint8_t GridPallet[] PROGMEM = {
0b0000001,0b00000011,0b00000111,0b01000111,0b01001111,//curse red glow
0b00001111,0b11001000,//normal colors per level
};
